E-CommerceIn the fast-paced economy of the world, e-commerce gives room for the smallest business to reach the global audience with its product and services at a reduced cost.
E-shops are open and available 24/7 and 365 days a year. GO-Globe delivers state-of-the-art e-commerce and corporate solutions for all kinds of businesses with any scale. Typical E-Commerce Modules:

Catalog & Product ManagementOrder ManagementShopping CartPayment Gateway IntegrationTax CalculationPrintable InvoiceShipping & DeliveryCustomer ManagementCustom SearchAnalytics and ReportingMarketing and PromotionsReviews and Ratings
Ranges & ContactE-commerce platformsE-commerce platforms are digital marketplaces that enable buyers and sellers to transact online. Examples of popular e-commerce platforms include Amazon, Shopify, eBay, Magento, and WooCommerce. These platforms provide a variety of features and services to facilitate online transactions, such as payment processing, inventory management, shipping, and customer support.
Custom e-commerce platforms offer several benefits for businesses that require a more tailored solution to their online selling needs. Here are some of the main advantages of using a custom e-commerce platform:
Tailored to your specific business needsImproved scalability and flexibilityEnhanced security and data privacyBetter branding and user experienceReduced reliance on third-party services
Enquire & E-commerceE-commerce successStarting an e-commerce business can be a rewarding and challenging experience. Here are some general steps you can follow to start your own e-commerce business:
Identify the products or services you want to sell. Research your target market and competitors, determine if there's demand for your products, who your competitors are, and what they're doing well. Choose an E-commerce Platform, here GO-Globe can assist perfectly. Has to be easy to use, scalable, and affordable = Create Your Online Store, visually appealing, easy to navigate, have high-quality images and product descriptions, and offer a secure checkout process. Set up payment and shipping options to cater to the needs of your customers.
Develop a marketing strategy to promote your e-commerce business. Use social media, email marketing, and other digital marketing channels to drive traffic to your website. Launch your e-commerce business and start selling. Test your website, analyze customer behavior, and make changes to improve the user experience and drive sales.
Starting an e-commerce business requires hard work, dedication, and patience. GO-Globe is ready to create a successful e-commerce business that meets the needs of your customers and generates profits. A few important tips:
User-Friendly DesignOptimize for SEOOffer High-Quality Product ImagesProvide Accurate Product DescriptionsSimplify the Checkout ProcessOffer Great Customer ServiceLeverage Social MediaMonitor Analytics
Relax, we will do it for you!Payment gatewaysPayment gateways are third-party services that allow businesses to accept and process payments online. They act as a bridge between the merchant and the customer's bank, securely transferring payment information and verifying transactions. Here are some of the popular payment gateways used in e-commerce in the Middle East region: Network International, PayTabs, Telr, Payfort, 2Checkout.com, CASHU.
These payment gateways cater to the specific needs of the Middle Eastern market, including local payment methods and multi-currency support. However, it's important to research and choose the payment gateway that best fits your business needs and integrates with your e-commerce platform.
Some International Payment Gateways:
PayPal is a widely used payment gateway that allows businesses to accept payments from customers worldwide. It offers a range of payment options, including credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal balance.Stripe allows businesses to accept payments from customers worldwide. It supports credit and debit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and other payment options.Square provides a range of payment processing solutions, including credit and debit cards, mobile payments, and invoicing.Authorize.net aims businesses with a range of payment processing solutions, including credit and debit cards, e-checks, and other payment options.Braintree provides businesses with a range of payment processing solutions, including credit and debit cards, PayPal, Venmo, and other payment options.Amazon Pay allows customers to use their Amazon account to make purchases on your e-commerce store. It supports credit and debit cards, as well as Amazon gift cards.
GO E-commerceE-commerce Trends & Future DevelopmentsE-commerce has rapidly transformed the retail industry over the past decade, and it continues to evolve at a rapid pace. Statistics show the increasing importance of e-commerce in the global economy and highlight the opportunities available for businesses to reach customers and expand their sales channels through online platforms.
E-commerce has become a significant driver of the global economy, with online sales accounting for a growing percentage of total retail sales. E-commerce now accounts for over 21% of all retail sales worldwide, China is the largest e-commerce market in the world, the United States is the second-largest e-commerce market, mobile commerce  is growing rapidly, with 73% of e-commerce sales. The most popular product categories for online shoppers include clothing and footwear, electronics, and books.
Here are just a few of the trends and future developments to watch in the world of e-commerce:
Mobile Commerce - mobile-friendly websites and mobile apps are essentialVoice Commerce - allows consumers to shop with ease and convenienceArtificial Intelligence - chatbots and virtual assistants to personalized recommendations and predictive analyticsAugmented Reality - virtual try-on experiences, allowing consumersSocial Commerce - allows consumers to shop seamlessly within their favorite social media appsSustainable and Ethical E-commerce - to gain a competitive advantage in the years ahead
